I thought the rule said no EMP.

--- cardhead649 <cardhead649@...> wrote:
> Wheeljack-X::
> 
> Jackie can't possibly dodge; the two opponents are a
> point-blank 
> range.  He does manage to twist around somewhat so
> that the blasts 
> strike across his chest and back instead of drilling
> into him, thus 
> minimizing the damage somewhat.
> 
> "WAAASSSAAAAP!!!" he yells, squaring up again and
> launching three 
> pairs of magneto-shells at his foe from his shoulder
> turrets..
> 
> OOC: The magneto-shell is a rather unusual weapon. 
> On impact it 
> generates a localized magnetic field, shorting out
> electronics.  
> Repeated hits can send a bot into stasis lock
> quickly no matter how 
> well armored.  It also tends to wipe out short-term
> memory.
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., "airly2000" <airly2002@h...>
> wrote:
> > Nightlight::
> > 
> > Nightlight fell stunned; Destructor's bite had
> reached her shoulder 
> > and did a severe wound there. The Pain didn't let
> her react.
> > 
> > 
> > --- In nbwrpg@y..., aerosmith60@c... wrote:

> transformed

> > > robot mode and fired 5 shots at him.
